DOC.brief_summary: This research project consist prospective diagnostic study conduct patient clinical suspicion rhabdomyolysis admit emergency room University Hospitals Nimes , Montpellier , Paris , Nice Toulon Inter Army Hospital . The main objective study determine whether plasma level Neutrophil Gelatinase Associated Lipocalin ( NGAL ) may retain predictor acute renal failure ( ARF ) occur within 48 hour admission rhabdomyolysis .
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Neutrophil Gelatinase Associated Lipocalin Levels During Emergency Management Rhabdomyolysis
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective : - study plasma NGAL level admission emergency ward marker morbidity mortality consider follow factor : duration hospitalization , need extracorporeal blood purification , ICU admission , death . - study delay onset propose cause rhabdomyolysis treatment initiation - study delay treatment initiation occurrence ARF .
DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Patient hospitalize Creatine PhosphoKinase > 1000 UI/l The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed Chronic renal insufficiency dialysis The patient acute coronary syndrome Nephrotoxic medication within 72 hour prior admission Need procedure involve injection iodine Patient shock Occurrence acute renal failure explain cause rhabdomyolysis .
